entry.title: https://github.com/nim-lang/Nim
entry.content: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. It combines successful concepts from mature languages like Python, Ada and Modula. Its design focuses on efficiency, expressiveness, and elegance (in that order of priority).

entry.title: https://github.com/nim-lang/langserver
entry.content: The Nim language server implementation (based on nimsuggest)

entry.title: https://github.com/nim-lang/nimble
entry.content: Package manager for the Nim programming language.

entry.title: https://github.com/nim-lang/nimforum
entry.content: Lightweight alternative to Discourse written in Nim

entry.title: https://github.com/status-im/nim-faststreams
entry.content: Nearly zero-overhead input/output streams for Nim

entry.title: https://github.com/status-im/nim-json-rpc
entry.content: Nim library for implementing JSON-RPC clients and servers

entry.title: https://github.com/status-im/nim-json-serialization
entry.content: Flexible JSON serialization not relying on run-time type information

entry.title: https://github.com/status-im/nim-stew
entry.content: stew is collection of utilities, std library extensions and budding libraries that are frequently used at Status, but are too small to deserve their own git repository.
